item.description: Complete - River Rescue; INC#0520; 07:10AM; 11201 N Big Tujunga Canyon Rd; MAP: https://bit.ly/3Zn0DWm; #Sunland; During a morning of extreme winter weather with cold, heavy rain and strong winds, a 61 year-old adult male was hoisted aboard a hovering LAFD rescue helicopter, and safely brought to nearby land, where he is now being medically treated by LAFD Paramedics for the affects of hypothermia. Determined to be the only victim, he will soon be transported by LAFD ambulance to an area hospital. The man (undetermined if homeless) states he was driving his van within the vast natural expanse of the Tujunga Wash at about midnight, when the vehicle (LAFD has not seen) was struck and disabled by a falling tree. He subsequently exited the van and remained on a small dirt island in the wash until spotted at sunrise by a passerby who called 911.; FS 74; Batt 12; Valley Bureau; Council District 7; AO1 AO2 BC10 BC12 BC15 CM40 CM42 E24 E274 E275 E298 E75 E77 E88 E89 E91 E98 EM15 H2 H3 H5 HA2 HA3 HA5 HR3 RA74 RA898 RA90 RA91 SC1 SW88 SW89 T74 T75 T98 UR88; CH5; 17 18; Brian Humphrey

River Rescue; INC#0520; 06:38AM; 11201 N Oro Vista Av; MAP: https://bit.ly/3EGxldt; #Sunland; PRELIM: LAFD ground and air response to an adult male stranded on dirt island within the Tujunga Wash. A hovering LAFD helicopter will soon hoist the man to safety.; FS 74; Batt 12; Valley Bureau; Council District 7; AO1 AO2 BC10 BC12 BC15 CM40 CM42 E24 E274 E275 E298 E75 E77 E88 E89 E91 E98 EM15 H2 H3 H5 HA2 HA3 HA5 HR3 RA74 RA898 RA90 RA91 SC1 SW88 SW89 T74 T75 T98 UR88; CH5; 17; Brian Humphrey

Knockdown - Structure Fire; INC#2279; 01:10AM; 10962 W Peoria St; MAP: https://bit.ly/3kpgy7O; #Shadow Hills; During a night of extreme winter weather with cold, heavy, wind-driven rain, 32 LAFD Firefighters took 3 hours and 3 minutes of relentless firefighting to access, confine and thoroughly extinguish stubborn flames, and perform salvage of household possessions from flames that extended from a basement into deep recesses within the the walls and attic of a 1,438 square foot one-story home, built 1934. No injury. Fire cause under investigation.; FS 77; Batt 12; Valley Bureau; Council District 7; BC12 E1 E239 E24 E274 E298 E89 E98 RA77 T39 T74 T98; CH9; 18; Brian Humphrey

Update Helicopter Rescue; INC#2536; 12:46AM; 15700 W Burbank Bl; MAP: https://bit.ly/3aPmUFx; #SepulvedaBasin; *Updated Patient Count* During a night of extreme winter weather with cold, heavy, wind-driven rain, LAFD ground and air responders came to the aid of four homeless adults (*3 males and 1 female*), as well as *four dogs and one cat* who were stranded in a remote area of land within the heavily flooded Sepulveda Flood Control Basin. An LAFD Helicopter landed to safely rescue the four adults and 5 pet animals, transferring them all directly to the LAFD Air Operations facility at Van Nuys Airport, where they were medically evaluated by LAFD Paramedics. Two of the adults (no further details) were determined to be suffering from hypothermia and were transported to an area hospital. The two remaining adults declined offered ambulance transportation, and took possession of the five animals, which appeared uninjured. No further details. ; FS 88; Batt 10; Valley Bureau; Council District 6; AO1 E88 E90 H2 H3 HA2 HA3 RA100 SC1 SW88 UR88; CH8; 17; Brian Humphrey

Structure Fire - Now Out; INC#0048; 12:25AM; 4230 N Bellingham Av; MAP: https://bit.ly/3ZfgxlE; #StudioCity; 30 LAFD Firefighters took just 15 minutes to access, confine and extinguish (12:40 AM) a detached garage to the rear of a single family home that was well involved with fire on their arrival. No injury. Fire cause under investigation.; FS 78; Batt 14; Valley Bureau; Council District 4; BC14 E102 E108 E260 E288 E86 RA78 T60 T88; CH9; 13; Brian Humphrey

Structure Fire; INC#2279; 10:07PM; 10962 W Peoria St; MAP: https://bit.ly/3kpgy7O; #ShadowHills; 32 LAFD Firefighters battling a basement fire that has extended into the walls and rear of a 1,438 square foot one-story home. ; FS 77; Batt 12; Valley Bureau; Council District 7; BC12 E1 E239 E24 E274 E298 E89 E98 RA77 T39 T74 T98; CH9; 18; Brian Humphrey

Helicopter Rescue; INC#2536; 11:12PM; 15700 W Burbank Bl; MAP: https://bit.ly/3aPmUFx; #SepulvedaBasin; LAFD ground and air response to four homeless persons and a dog stranded in a remote and heavily flooded section of the Sepulveda Flood Control Basin. An LAFD Helicopter will be able to land/hover at water level to safely rescue the apparently uninjured persons and canine, transferring them directly to the LAFD Air Operations facility at Van Nuys Airport, where they will be medically evaluated by LAFD Paramedics. No further details.; FS 88; Batt 10; Valley Bureau; Council District 6; E88 E90 H2 H3 HA2 HA3 SC1 SW88 UR88; CH8; 17; Brian Humphrey

Rescue; INC#2197; 09:41PM; 5900 N Vassar Av; MAP: https://bit.ly/3xStyWQ; #WoodlandHills; PRELIM: First arriving LAFD Firefighters quickly freed the sole uninjured occupant (undetermined age/gender) trapped in a (parked?) vehicle who was briefly trapped by a 'large' fallen tree (unspecified size / species). Though there was strong storm activity in the area, LAFD does not formally determine the specific cause of a tree falling. No further details.; FS 84; Batt 17; Valley Bureau; Council District 3; BC17 E100 E107 E288 E73 EM17 HR3 RA106 RA84 T88 UR88; CH8; 17; Brian Humphrey

Rescue; INC#2037; 08:54PM; 2370 N Laurel Canyon Bl; MAP: https://bit.ly/3Iskg8F; #HollywoodHills West; PRELIM: Energized high voltage wires down across roadway and occupied vehicle(s), with uninjured occupant(s) stranded within until the arrival of electric utility crews. Unknown ETA. Roadway closed to all vehicle traffic in the immediate area of Laurel Canyon Boulevard and Jovenita Canyon Drive. No further details. ; FS 97; Batt 14; Valley Bureau; Council District 4; E41; CH8; Brian Humphrey

Agency Assist; INC#2008; 08:44PM; 4286 S Dalton Av; MAP: https://bit.ly/3IQiP5w; #VermontSquare; LAFD has preceded the L.A. Dept of Building & Safety to an unknown size/species tree that has reportedly fallen onto a one-story home. No injury. Unknown visual. Though there is strong storm activity in the area, LAFD does not formally determine the specific cause of a tree falling. No further details.; FS 46; Batt 13; South Bureau; Council District 8; E215 T15; CH7; Brian Humphrey
